statements: SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_content FROM text_data WHERE id > 2;
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data WHERE id <= 3;
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE id = 4 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE text_content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data WHERE id > 3;
SELECT text_content FROM text_data WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE text_content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM text_data;
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_content, id FROM text_data ORDER BY text_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM summaries WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT summary_content FROM summaries WHERE text_id = 5;
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_content, id FROM text_data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data JOIN summaries ON text_data.id = summaries.text_id WHERE text_content LIKE '%important%' AND id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT id, summary_content FROM summaries WHERE summary_content IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT text_content AS content, id FROM text_data WHERE text_content <> '' ORDER BY id LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM text_data;
SELECT id, text_data FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT s.summary_id, s.summary_text, t.text_data FROM summaries s JOIN text_data t ON s.original_text_id = t.id;
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT summary_id, summary_text FROM summaries ORDER BY summary_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%e%';
SELECT * FROM text_data JOIN summaries ON text_data.id = summaries.original_text_id;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM document;
SELECT sentence_text FROM sentence WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, word_text FROM word WHERE sentence_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT document_id, summary_text FROM summary WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT id, text FROM document WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM document;
SELECT id, document_id, sentence_text FROM sentence WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, sentence_id, word_text FROM word ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT document_id, summary_text FROM summary WHERE id > 3;
SELECT d.id, s.sentence_text, w.word_text FROM document d JOIN sentence s ON d.id = s.document_id JOIN word w ON s.id = w.sentence_id;
SELECT * FROM text_documents;
SELECT id, document_text FROM text_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sentence_text, keyword_text FROM sentences JOIN keywords ON sentences.id = keywords.sentence_id;
SELECT id, summary_text FROM summaries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT document_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS avg_score FROM evaluations GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT * FROM text_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_text FROM text_documents WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, document_text FROM text_documents ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT s.sentence_text, k.keyword_text FROM sentences s JOIN keywords k ON s.id = k.sentence_id;
SELECT s.sentence_text, k.keyword_text, e.evaluation_score FROM sentences s JOIN keywords k ON s.id = k.sentence_id JOIN evaluations e ON e.summary_id = 1;
